title: How to publish a book on the Amazon Kindle Direct program - Quora

response.answer_text:
Self Publishing | Amazon Kindle Direct Publishing
Amazon Self-Publishing: How to Publish on Amazon [Step-by 
——-Here's how to upload your book to Amazon: In your Kindle Direct Publishing account, go to “Your Bookshelf”.Locate and click on “Kindle eBook Actions” next to the title of your book.Locate and click on “Edit eBook Content”.Click on “Upload eBook manuscript”.Upload your manuscript file on your computer.
Open an account with Kindle Direct Publishing (KDP).Upload your ebook file.Set the price and click the “PUBLISH” button.
